name: SMBZ: Battle of the Best (Ver 0.1.1)
description:
This build is Version 0.1.1

Disclaimer: A controller with at least 9 buttons is recommended for this game*

-Controls-

(P1, P2)

Left: A, Left

Right: D, Right

Up: W, Up

Down: S, Down

Jump: Q, M

Crouch: R, /

Light Attack: F, Comma (,)

Medium Attack: G, Period (.)

Heavy Attack: E, N

There are some other dev keys too, just not telling you where

Credits:

Mario - Asylusgoji91 & JH-Production

Luigi - Asylusgoji91 & JH-Production

Goomba - Superstupidy

Music: NemesisTheroy & PowerGlove(?)

Special Thanks: Mark Haynes Nintendo, Sega

If I got the crediting wrong please inform me, I tried my best.
